title: 96/92/EC: Commission Decision of 11 January 1996 amending Decision 91/449/EEC laying down the specimen animal health certificates in respect of meat products imported from third countries, to take account of certain products imported from Uruguay (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 11 January 1996 amending Decision 91/449/EEC laying down the specimen animal health certificates in respect of meat products imported from third countries, to take account of certain products imported from Uruguay (Text with EEA relevance) (96/92/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 91/449/EEC is hereby amended as follows:
1. In Annex A, second part, the following country is added:
'Uruguay (except for products based on pigmeat)`.
2. In Annex E, second part, delete:
'Uruguay`,
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 January 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 240, 29. 8. 1991, p. 28.
(3) OJ No L 91, 22. 4. 1995, p. 56.
